description: In this course, we will cover the basics of Angular, a framework used by several applications that are used daily, such as Gmail, PayPal, and YouTube. It is therefore very popular in the market.
name: How to Create a Web Application with Angular

description: A compact and focused course on the quick and practical acquisition of Angular fundamentals, in which I will guide you, following the official Angular guide, step by step in creating a simple application. By the end of the course, you will have a basic understanding of the terminology and functionality of this beautiful framework.
name: The Basics of Angular
